page.title: 07A Muslim Morning In Oldham
page.content: Usally I wake up at 6.00 a.m.Next I do{WOOZOO.WOOZOO}is when I first of all wash my hands,put water in my mouth three times and spit it out again,wash my face and wet my hair ,the back of my neck and my ears,and finally my feet.I do this because when you read{NOMAZ}you have to be clean. After that I cover all my hair and read{NOMAZ}which is a special prayer, and read on a special mat called{ {MUSALLA.}Next I reate the{QURAN}. It is breakfast time.Guess i have for breakfast.I have pranti tea,or sometimes fried egg.Well,pranti are abit like chappati which is made from flour ,it is crunchy with butter.
